title: Emmerdale spoilers: Aaron and Robert flee tonight as rapist Lee dies
text:
Robert Sugden (Ryan Hawley) has been under a lot of pressure lately in Emmerdale, what with him facing a stretch in prison for what he did to rapist Lee, but matters are set to become further complicated in tonight’s episode, as he learns that Lee has died as a result of his injuries, which prompts him and Aaron Dingle (Danny Miller) to come to a huge decision.

After Victoria was raped by Lee earlier this year, the police were unable to bring a case against him, so Robert set out to seek revenge on behalf of his sister.

He attempted to humiliate the rapist but, with Lee toying with him and constantly playing games, he found himself unable to hold back, and thus he lost control — hitting Lee on the back of the head with a shovel. As a result, he was charged with GBH with intent.

Robert’s been enjoying the time he’s got left as a free man with Aaron, but matters go from bad to worse in tonight’s episode, when Victoria (Isabel Hodgins) arrives at her brother’s house with devastating news. Lee has died as a result of his injuries, which, of course, means that Robert’s looking at being charged with murder.

Determined to help her family, Liv (Isobel Steele) suggests that Robert goes on the run — and that Aaron should go with him. After some deliberation, the pair agree to do so.

As they set about going on the run, however, the pair are hit by the reality of what it is that they’re about to do — and bidding farewell to their nearest and dearest with little time to do so will no doubt prove an incredibly difficult task.

Will Robert and Aaron successfully manage to get out of dodge?

Emmerdale continues on Tuesday 15th October at 7pm on ITV.
